channel.title: Blogs on Schulich Ignite
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Schulich Ignite

item.title: Winter 2021 Gala
item.description: Last weekend, Schulich Ignite celebrated the end of our Winter 2021 sessions with a Gala Event! The Gala Event celebrated the accomplishments of over 300 students who attended our workshops this semester.

item.title: End of Winter 2021 Sessions!
item.description: Last weekend, Schulich Ignite celebrated the end of our Winter 2021 sessions with a Gala Event! The Gala Event celebrated the accomplishments of over 300 students who attended our workshops this semester.

item.title: Club of the Year!
item.description: Schulich Ignite is excited to announce that we have received the 2020-2021 SU Club of the Year Award! Thank you to the Studentâ€™s Union for the recognition, we are honoured to be the recipients of the award this year.

item.title: Halfway Point of Sessions!
item.description: Schulich Ignite is now in our fourth week of sessions, marking the halfway point of our workshops this semester! Our beginner sessions covered lists and loops this week while our advanced sessions talked about inheritance.

item.title: Fall 2020 Gala
item.description: Schulich Ignite celebrated the end of our fall sessions with a Gala! At the Gala, we congratulated our students for completing the workshop.

item.title: Collaboration with Information Security Club
item.description: We are excited for our collaboration with the Information Security Club which will be happening in the last week of November!

item.title: Follow us on Instagram!
item.description: Whether you are a Schulich Ignite mentee or not, make sure to follow our Instagram @schulichignite to see some cool weekly challenges and coding tips!

item.title: Start of Sessions!
item.description: Today marks the start of the 2020 Fall sessions. We are excited to meet all of you and see how your coding skills progress over the upcoming 8 weeks!

item.title: Summer 2020 Gala
item.description: Schulich Ignite celebrated the end of our summer sessions with a Gala! At the Gala, students had the chance to showcase the projects that they have been working on for the past two weeks to mentors and friends.
